import React from 'react' import ReactDOM from 'react-dom' import { Container } from './styles' import { BrowserRouter as Router } from 'react-router-dom' import { NavHashLink, HashLink } from 'react-router-hash-link' import { useState } from 'react' import Curriculo from '../../assets/CV.pdf' export function Header() { const [isActive, setActive] = useState(false) function toggleTheme() { let html = document.getElementsByTagName('html')[0] html.classList.toggle('light') } function closeMenu() { setActive(false) } return ( H tet
HOME ABOUT ME PORTFOLIO CONTACT CV
{ setActive(!isActive) }} >
 ) }
